org.apache.hama.bsp

Class BSPApplicationMaster

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hama.bsp.BSPApplicationMaster
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable, BSPClient, Constants, BSPPeerProtocol, HamaRPCProtocolVersion, VersionedProtocol

    public class BSPApplicationMaster
extends Object
implements BSPClient, BSPPeerProtocol
    BSPApplicationMaster is an application master for Apache Hamas BSP Engine.
